title: Thai Pork satay
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter', '1/2 bunch finely chopped spring onions', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 1/2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/8 teaspoon dried crushed chillies', '1 whole pork fillet, cubed', '1 (220g) tin water chestnuts, drained', '1 green pepper, cut into 4cm (2 in) pieces', '1 red pepper, cut into 4cm (2 in) pieces', '1 small onion, chopped', 'skewers']
